NL System Query: Hi, can you show me how to play Quarto?
Could you show me a winning condition?
User Response: Assume you demonstrate this win condition

NL System Query: For the winning board you just showed, how can I translate the pieces to get another win?
User Response: No, there is no way to translate the pieces.

NL System Query: For the same board, is it a win because of the number of the pieces?
User Response: Yes, though it is not the only reason.

NL System Query: Can you show me another winning condition?
User Response: Assume you demonstrate this win condition

NL System Query: Let's change to this board. For this board how can I translate the pieces to get another winning condition?
User Response: There is no way to translate the pieces.

NL System Query: For the same winning board, will it be another win if I add a piece on the forth row and the second column?
User Response: Yes, it will be another win.
Comments: Mispelling "fourth", the 3rd row in this case might not be the top row to the user.

NL System Query: For the same winning board, how can I rotate the pieces to get another win?
User Response: You can put all the pieces to the last column.
Comments: Would be in the first column.

NL System Query: Can you show me another way to win?
User Response: Assume you demonstrate this win condition

NL System Query: For the same board, is it still a win if I put a piece above the green piece?
User Response: Yes, it is still a win.
